House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00017
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A CONDITIONAL CASH TRANSFER PROGRAM, PROVIDING FOR THE AUTOMATIC INDEXATION OF CASH GRANTS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Pantawid Pamilyang Pilipino Program (4ps) Act
ABSTRACT : Institutionalizes the Pantawid Pamilyang Pilipino Program (4Ps) which is a human development measure of the national government administered by the Department of Social Welfare Development (DSWD) that provides conditional cash grants to the poorest of the poor, aimed at reducing, if not eradicating, the incidence of poverty in the country.
